DOC.brief_summary: Patients over the age of 18 with thyroid nodules scheduled for surgery will undergo EIS scan. Each node will be scanned and graded form 1-5 (1=benign, 5=malignant). Results will be compared with final histopathology.
DOC.brief_title: Electrical Impedance Scanning of Thyroid Nodules Prior to Thyroid Surgery: a Prospective Study
DOC.criteria: Patients over the age of 18 with thyroid nodules scheduled for surgery. Pregnant patients PAtients with electrical powered devices (cardiac pacemakers)
